post.body: Oooh that really sucks. Mine came uncanceled w/ a note saying that they require 84c, but a bunch have already been delivered!
Did you add more postage, or just resend them as is? Why should I add an extra 20c when the rest went through fine???
belgium
You make this whole pregnancy thing sound way too complicated!
Me want. Sadly, I live too close to Baltimore -- I saw several Ravens jerseys at the supermarket today (wore my Ward jersey, natch).
dentist
I am so impressed with your "blueprint" for your gingerbread house! Can't wait to see a picture of the finished product!
silent night
Yes
brachot
That's so disappointing that he had to leave early when there was such a great end to the game!
Congratulations!!!!
Oh no! I hope it catches up with you soon! I have had the WORST LUCK which is why I haven't checked a bag in about 6 years!
Yeah I have a feeling I'll be one of the very few in the building next week. At least I get to hog the lab equipment to myself!
An excellent day to get married! (My wedding was the Sun of Memorial Day, too)
Ugh, I hate that. I have been invited to 7 weddings for this summer. All on May 23rd. ?!?!?
Write them in first person plural... I wrote them all (and signed Hubby's name) but said "We were so glad you could attend" etc
Totally perplexed why half of my cards were mailed out, and half of the IDENTICAL cards came back to my mailbox requiring more postage?!
I cannot make any sense of this fluorescence polarization data, unless my peptide is forming a dimer. #%$@!!!!
Steelers clinch the AFC North!!! First-round playoff bye!!!
HERE WE GO, STEELERS, HERE WE GO!!!!!!!!!!
Just finished frying 6 dozen latkes in preparation for next weekend's Chrismukkah party... oy vey!
The AKTAprime now officially has 3.5 of its 4 "feet" in the grave.
Officially hate science/proteins/buffers/etc. You name it if it relates to my degree, I hate it.
But at least YAY STEELERS!!!!!!!
Glad to have the hubbub of an almost-full lab (yes, we are that lab that never closes for holidays) to keep my mind off my grandmother.
It would be nice if someone in my family could bother to answer their phone or return my messages to update me on my grandmother's status...
My grandmother is having a stroke. For the first time in my life, I wish I lived closer to my family.
OH NO HE DIDN'T JUST STOMP ON A TERRIBLE TOWEL! Hate you, Titans.
HERE WE GO, STEELERS, HERE WE GO!!
Chrismukkah party time!! All our bestest friends have driven hours and hours to come celebrate... it's going to be a great night!
My MIL called to thank me for the card I sent her, and my husband is insanely jealous that she didn't want to talk to him. Only children...
Getting ready for our annual Chrismukkah party! Cleaning, cooking, decorating, etc. Happy Chrismukkah!
Meh. Bored with experiments. Going to lunch with coworkers instead. :)
I think my husband and I are the only two people in our entire condo building that follow the rules about breaking down cardboard boxes.
The post-docs are throwing ice at the lab techs. I may be the youngest person in the lab age-wise, but I'm pretty sure I'm the most mature.
Test purification of the new shipment of bacteria I just received.
Totally blind courtesy of seven different types of eyedrops at the ophthalmologist. Now all super squinty which hurts face.
